import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import api from '../api'; function AddStaff() { let navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUsers] = useState({ firstname:"", lastname:"", username:"", email:"", password:"", role:"" }); const{firstname, lastname, username, password,email, role} = user; const onInputChange = (e) =>{ setUsers({...user, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}); }; const onSubmit= async(e) => { e.preventDefault(); await api.post("/", user); navigate('/home'); }; return (
